title: Inquis AI
description: [IN PROGRESS] Spearheaded the development of an AI platform enabling non-technical users to create tailored virtual assistants powered by domain-specific large language models. Enhanced student engagement and learning efficiency by 20% through an integrated front-end and scalable back-end.

title: Live Flash Auctioning System
description: Developed a real-time auction platform with low-latency bidding, synchronized countdown timers, and scalable architecture using AWS services. Reduced response time by 30% and enhanced user engagement through personalized notifications.

title: Smart Photo Album
description: Created a web application for uploading, storing, and searching photos using natural language queries. Leveraged AWS ElasticSearch, S3, and Lambda for automation and scalability.

title: VibeCheck
description: Developed a music-based social networking application integrated with Spotify API for real-time engagement. Achieved a 50-60% latency reduction using Redis Channels and launched it on AWS with a robust CI/CD pipeline.

title: Roomio
description: Built an apartment rental and roommate finder web application with a secure and scalable architecture. Designed an optimized relational database schema for efficient data transactions.
